originalText.text: Liz is so a very kind and professional photographer. She is very skilled at producing high quality photos and makes you feel comfortable through the whole experience. Would highly recommend her to any of my friends and family.

text.text: Liz is so a very kind and professional photographer. She is very skilled at producing high quality photos and makes you feel comfortable through the whole experience. Would highly recommend her to any of my friends and family.

originalText.text: We love our pictures that Liz has taken for us. She has an incredible eye for composition and can capture the real person behind the smile. We felt so comfortable working with her.

text.text: We love our pictures that Liz has taken for us. She has an incredible eye for composition and can capture the real person behind the smile. We felt so comfortable working with her.

originalText.text: Liz is not only a creative and talented photographer, but the very soul of patience and a resourceful and good natured manager of even very challenging conditions!  Our family photos turned out amazing, despite our wiggly and determined one-year-old running everywhere and a steady rain, both of which made the outdoor project a special challenge. She made the experience fun for him and all of us, and her excellent eye managed to find the perfect spots to capture beautiful and real moments while also dodging the heaviest of the rain.  Liz is the best!

text.text: Liz is not only a creative and talented photographer, but the very soul of patience and a resourceful and good natured manager of even very challenging conditions!  Our family photos turned out amazing, despite our wiggly and determined one-year-old running everywhere and a steady rain, both of which made the outdoor project a special challenge. She made the experience fun for him and all of us, and her excellent eye managed to find the perfect spots to capture beautiful and real moments while also dodging the heaviest of the rain.  Liz is the best!

originalText.text: We had such a wonderful time doing photos with Liz! We did some NYC engagement pictures around Bethesda Fountain in September. She was super communicative through every step of the process. She was willing to rearrange the time a little bit to make sure the weather worked out well for us. She was really easy to work with. She worked quickly and efficiently and was wiling to do what she needed to do to "get the shot". She communicated what she wanted from each of us in order to create the photo and always took multiple pictures to make sure to get the best from each of us. She was willing to work with the location that we wanted (even if a little busy at that time of day) and was flexible with the people around us, still getting wonderful shots of just the two of us. She was also willing to recreate some of the shots that I had "envisioned" and tried to explain to her, capturing what I was hoping for the photos. She was comfortable to be around and our smiles were genuine throughout the shoot, helping us be our best selves in the photos. Her pricing was more than fair and the download process for our photos was simple. She did the editing with a great turnaround time and we were very happy with the trueness of the colors of the pictures and the quality of the pictures. We would totally recommend a photoshoot with Liz Green Photography!

originalText.text: Liz has done a great job with our family photos the last two years. The kids giggle the whole time. Liz also has a fast turnaround and is easy to work with in scheduling, location and touch ups.
